text: I feel sorry for Gordo somewhat. I was always the outcast, the guy who never had that many friends. I hung by myself and read Philip K Dick and Kurt Vonnegut. I never was that close to anyone, and always seemed to hang with myself. Being exposed to people and suddenly realizing that you can't be with them anymore is very disheartening. I hope that this is sort of like Nightcrawler, with a deplorable anti hero that we care for and are so immersed in that character.
author: Morgan Tran
